_comment: AddressBook save file which contains the same Person values as in TypicalPersons#getTypicalAddressBook()

flashcards.question: Store-and-forward
flashcards.answer: Entire packet must arrive at a router before it can be transmitted on the next link

flashcards.question: Formula for propagation delay
flashcards.answer: d, length of physical link (m) / s, propagation speed in medium (~2x10^8 m/sec)

flashcards.question: Formula for transmission delay
flashcards.answer: L, packet length (bits) / R, link bandwidth (bps)

flashcards.question: Throughput definition
flashcards.answer: How many bits can be transmitted per unit time

flashcards.question: What is a Protocol
flashcards.answer: Protocols define format and order of messages exchanged and the action taken after messages are sent or received
